name: Miss Arti Kumari
greetingText: Everytime I utter your name,I feel blush btw!
wishText: Sunooo, mujhe na tum pe bohat pyar aa raha. I don't know how to express my feelings but mujhe itna pata he ke ab ye control me nahi he.Hn me man ta hu me thoda stupid hu idot hu par jo bhi jesa bhi hu tumhara ban na chahta hu.I can't promise that i will be perfect, but I can promise that i will always try to make you smile & be there when you need me.Kya aisa ho nahi sakta Hum tumko tumse mange, Aur tum muskura ke kaho Apni chij manga nahi karte. Kya aisa ho sakta he ke tum mujhe apni khyoise batao aur me bolu qubool hai.will you teach me how to love you,what you like, what you wish for. I wanna know everything, I wanna love you the way you want to be loved ❤️
